QuestData.Title: Dread Priming
QuestData.Description:
Sire Denathrius has requested I help you prepare for the hunt. Every hunter must help prepare a soul here in the Grove of Terror.
I have a stubborn soul here who's been quite uncooperative, Houndmaster Loksey. His time has come to be hunted.
<The Fearstalker hands you a set of Hopebreaker Soul Chains.>
Demoralize him. We can't let him leave here with any hope. The hunt is meant to break the souls so they become less... resistant to the processes of Revendreth.
QuestData.LogDescription: Prepare Houndmaster Loksey for the Penitent Hunt in the Grove of Terror.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring Houndmaster Loksey to Flockmaster Sergio in the Grove of Terror.
QuestData.RewardText:
This soul is nearly ready.
We have an opportunity to finish preparing this one and take care of a problem in the process.

Objectives.Objective: Houndmaster Loksey demoralized by the gargons
